snippet: Oussama Mellouli of Tunisia became first swimmer to win a medal in pool and open water events in the same Games.
abstract: Olympics Roundup; Oussama Mellouli of Tunisia becomes the first swimmer to win a medal in the pool and in the open water in the same Games, winning bronze in the men's 1,500 meter freestyle, the longest pool event, and gold in the 10k open water event; other news noted.
lead_paragraph: Oussama Mellouli of Tunisia became first swimmer to win a medal in pool and open water events in the same Games.

headline.seo: Tunisian Overcomes Illness to Win Olympic 10K Open Water Event
headline.main: Tunisian Overcomes Illness to Win Open Water Event
headline.print_headline: Sick to His Stomach, but Satisfied
